title: Twitter : number of monetizable daily active U.S. users 2017 to 2019
yAxis: Number of monetizable daily active users in millions
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '17.
The highest Quarter Q4 '19 has 6.0 more Number of monetizable daily active users in millions than the lowest Quarter Q4 '17.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monetizable daily active users in millions for 12 number of Quarters.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '17.
The difference of Number of monetizable daily active users in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 6.0.
The Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions, followed by , and Q2 '19. Down to the Quarter Q4 '17 which is the lowest.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions has declined over the past 12 Quarters.
Quarter Q3 '18, Q2 '18, Q1 '18, Q3 '17, and Q1 '17 have the same Number of monetizable daily active users in millions.
Considered together, the average Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in all 12 Quarters is roughly 27.08.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is 325.0 if we add up values of all Quarters.
